GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiStyle class.

GetName.name: GetName
GetName.description: Returns a name of the current style.

SetName.name: SetName
SetName.description: Sets a name of the current style.

params.name: sStyleName
params.description: The name which will be used for the current style.

GetType.name: GetType
GetType.description: Returns a type of the current style.

GetTextPr.name: GetTextPr
GetTextPr.description: Returns the text properties of the current style.

GetParaPr.name: GetParaPr
GetParaPr.description: Returns the paragraph properties of the current style.

GetTablePr.name: GetTablePr
GetTablePr.description: Returns the table properties of the current style.

GetTableRowPr.name: GetTableRowPr
GetTableRowPr.description: Returns the table row properties of the current style.

GetTableCellPr.name: GetTableCellPr
GetTableCellPr.description: Returns the table cell properties of the current style.

SetBasedOn.name: SetBasedOn
SetBasedOn.description: Specifies the reference to the parent style which this style inherits from in the style hierarchy.

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The parent style which the style inherits properties from.

GetConditionalTableStyle.name: GetConditionalTableStyle
GetConditionalTableStyle.description: Returns a set of formatting properties which will be conditionally applied to the parts of a table that match the requirement specified in the sType parameter.

params.name: sType
params.description: The table part which the formatting properties must be applied to.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiStyle object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteNumberings
params.description: Specifies if the used numberings will be written to the JSON object or not.
